pl.kernelpanic.dbmonster.connection
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  pl.kernelpanic.dbmonster.connection.Transaction
public class Transaction
extends Object

This class provides an unified interface for JDBC connections. It wraps standard JDBC calls.

Version:
$Id: Transaction.java,v 1.1 2004/05/22 13:14:16 majek Exp $
Author:
Piotr Maj <piotr.maj@kernelpanic.pl>
